titleStmt.title: A wonder of wonders: or, Gods people the worlds wonder, or They are men wondred at very profitable for these times, wherein men take so much liberty to sin and dishonour our God. Written by Roger Hough a lover of the truth.
titleStmt.author: Hough, Roger.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for T. Passenger at the Three Bibles on the middle of London-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Gods people wicked mens wonder.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
